root.text:
To sustain in the race, you have to express yourself.
Here is an opportunity for you to reveal your thoughts to others. We are awaiting to learn and grow from the content you share!

text: New technique in waste water management.
Applications of geotextiles in civil engineering.
The willing participants are directed to send the abstract of the given presentation to technicalrelevationpsgkriya@gmail.com on or before 13.02.2020
The abstract should not exceed 250 words.
The shortlisted abstract will be notified to participants on 15.02.2020
The participants whose abstract is approved by the organizing committee is permitted to present.
The participants should adhere to the timing (20 mins for presentation and 5 mins for viva).
The judges’ decision will be final.

root.text: •  The participants should adhere to the timing (20 mins for presentation and 5 mins for viva).
